name: RaggieSoft Hub (Elara)
description: A bespoke Hub-and-Spoke content network architecture. 'Elara' handles dynamic routing, 301 redirection for legacy SEO, and JSON-driven content injection across multiple sub-brands (Corporate, Band, Books).

name: The Stardust Engine
description: A 'dual-layer' narrative experience simulating a fictional 1980s synth-rock band. Features a custom persistent audio player (SPA-like behavior), deep lore wiki, and responsive 'Theme Injection' that changes the UI based on the narrative era.

name: Project Jessica
description: The 'Chief Logistics Officer' of the RaggieSoft network. A bash-based automation suite handling multi-repo Git synchronization and DigitalOcean Spaces asset replication (via rclone) without requiring root privileges.

name: Project KNOX
description: A responsive reading platform for the 'Knox' sci-fi universe. Focused on typography, high-contrast readability (WCAG AAA), and semantic structure for screen readers.
